name: BIT BLOC
description:
BIT BLOC is a small, retro exploration and building game made for the Minecraft in 24 Hours Jam!

How to play

WASD to move, LEFT MOUSE to break blocks, RIGHT MOUSE to place blocks.

E to open the inventory, ESCAPE to access the menu.

Drag the mouse to move items into the hotbar.

(I may have forgotten to turn off debug mode, so press N to fly around)

Features

Walking!!!!!!!

Perlin noise terrain generation! Walk until either your computer crashes or you get bored

Basic inventory and building!

Chunks, Plants, blocks, and more blocks!

Things

Everything made within the 24 hours except the perlin noise math

Art drawn in Aseprite, Absolute silence composed by me, 8 hours in GameMaker Studio 2, 16 hours scratching my head, 2 hours checking my math

Upcoming

"Right now," I'm working on better terrain generation, more blocks, and other things I can't tell you about yet
